sentences.en: Another type of selling is by mail order . This may be complimented by telesales staff.
sentences.cn: 另一种销售方式是通过邮购,与其相配套的是电话推销人员.

sentences.en: Have you had some training related to telesales in your past years?
sentences.cn: 在过去的几年中,你接受过电话销售的相关培训 吗 ?

sentences.en: Many people start their careers in telesales.
sentences.cn: 许多人都是从干电话销售做起的。

sentences.en: There are a wealth of telesales jobs advertised.
sentences.cn: 广告里有大量电话销售的岗位。

trans.tran_en: a way of selling products to people by telephone
